title: District M DMX Adapter Params
description: A schema which validates params accepted by the DMX adapter

memberid.description: Represent boost MemberId from districtm UI

placement_id.description: memberid replacement / alternative value or equivalent

seller_id.description: Represent DMX Partner when you get onboarded, this is for specific setup BURL vs NURL

dmxid.description: Represent the placement ID dmxid equivalent to 'tagid', this value is optional

tagid.description: Represent the placement ID tagid equivalent to 'dmxid', this value is optional

bidfloor.description: The minimum price acceptable for a bid, this is optional since we do get the one from the original openrtb request
